last_episode_to_air.name: Cancel Culture
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sandra wants to switch her college major, but she's afraid to tell her parents.

name: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living
overview: After losing his job, Jeremy, a patriarch of a young family with teenage children, decides to move to the backwoods of Georgia to help his crazy grandfather. Grandpa Vinny has foolishly purchased a terribly run-down home for the elderly and he is in way over his head, but comedy ensues as Mr. Brown and Cora show up at the right time as needy investors.

episodes.name: The Pilot 101
episodes.overview: Jeremy and his family arrive at an assisted living facility in Atlanta to visit his Grandpa Vinny; the Wilson family is shocked by who and what they find at the facility.

episodes.name: A Talk with Pa
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Leah attempt to get Sandra and Phillip adjusted to their new living situation.

episodes.name: The Weeping Willow
episodes.overview: Vinny and Mr. Brown exchange details about their encounters with Madea.

episodes.name: Swimming With Fishes
episodes.overview: Leah tells Sandra and Philip that it's time to get them registered for their new school.

episodes.name: The Monster
episodes.overview: Jeremy's online plumber training backfires on him, literally.

episodes.name: Dark Chocolate
episodes.overview: Sandra tries to mislead Philip about where she's going and who with.

episodes.name: A Lamb To Slaughter
episodes.overview: Leah and Jeremy learn that Philip and Sandra have left the facility without their knowledge or their permission.

episodes.name: Hard Decisions
episodes.overview: Sandra confronts Philip about snitching to their parents.

episodes.name: Mary Jane
episodes.overview: Leah learns that Mr. Brown has cut down Vinny's plants in the back yard.

episodes.name: A Huge Debt
episodes.overview: Leah attempts to track Sandra's phone when she goes missing.

episodes.name: Defiance
episodes.overview: Cora calls Sheriff Luckett about Sandra running off with his son.

episodes.name: Rebel with a Cause
episodes.overview: Sheriff Luckett stops by to have a talk with Jeremy about their kids.

episodes.name: The Talk
episodes.overview: Sandra responds to the most unlikely motivator.

episodes.name: Add More Color
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown gives Sandra advice on how to get what she wants and her outfit for school.

episodes.name: The Brown Bomber
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Leah agree to have Lindor over for dinner.

episodes.name: Open for Business
episodes.overview: Lindor offers to be a helping hand around the living facility.

episodes.name: Being a Good Citizen
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown tells Leah what Cora thinks about her cooking.

episodes.name: To Trust Or Not To Trust
episodes.overview: Sandra has a change of heart concerning Lindor, and her parents want to know why.

episodes.name: A Fight For Honor
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown prepares dinner for the kids.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Situation
episodes.overview: After losing his job, Jeremy decides to move to the backwoods of Georgia to help his grandfather, who has purchased a rundown home for the elderly.

episodes.name: Bail Buns
episodes.overview: After losing his job, Jeremy decides to move to the backwoods of Georgia to help his grandfather, who has purchased a rundown home for the elderly.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: The family finds themselves in hot water after a new tenant moves in, and they get a surprise visitor.

episodes.name: If The Cape Fits
episodes.overview: Leah struggles to find her place at the Pleasant Days Assisted Living Facility.

episodes.name: The Triangle
episodes.overview: Vinny and Reginald compete for new resident Anastasia's affections.

episodes.name: Bait and Snitch
episodes.overview: The Assisted Living crew welcomes new resident Efetobore Efe Omowale, but snap judge him as a scammer and deploys tactics to stall the signing of his lease.

episodes.name: Mega
episodes.overview: When a council seat in the community opens up, both Jeremy and Vinny decide to run for office with wildly different platforms to improve the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Driving Miss Crazy
episodes.overview: Anastasia struggles to deal with a potential loss of independence when the Assisted Living crew suggests she shouldn't drive anymore.

episodes.name: Funny Bidness
episodes.overview: Efe and Mr. Brown start a business with a new anti-aging product, but it goes awry when the product has adverse effects and a lawsuit is threatened.

episodes.name: Who Are You to Judge
episodes.overview: After Jeremy buys a lemon from Mr. Brown, he takes legal action to recoup his loss.

episodes.name: Yolo
episodes.overview: Philip and Sandra hatch plans to make workaholic Jeremy take a timeout for family.

episodes.name: Mr.Big Stuffed
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown lets business success go to his head, but he gets taken down a peg when the residents threaten to move out.

episodes.name: Field Day
episodes.overview: Sandra's new problem causes major division in the Assisted Living facility.

episodes.name: Christmas Staycation
episodes.overview: The family's plans for Christmas get interrupted by inclement weather.

episodes.name: Only the Lonely
episodes.overview: After losing his job, Jeremy decides to move to the backwoods of Georgia to help his grandfather, who has purchased a rundown home for the elderly.

episodes.name: Ark Tank
episodes.overview: The crew competes for a cash prize on Ark Tank, a community initiative to get seniors to invent solutions for the betterment of their community.

episodes.name: Little Miss Sunshine
episodes.overview: After Cora struggles to get the residents of Pleasant Days to partake in activities, a new resident comes in and breathes new life into everyone.

episodes.name: What the Wellness
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown vows that he's finished eating meat until he's left alone with a lot of soul food.

episodes.name: Pleasant Days Got Talent
episodes.overview: A talent show reveals to residents of Pleasant Day parts of themselves and their relationships they need to work on and fix.

episodes.name: Stuck in a Ditch
episodes.overview: Sandra's junior prom date ditches her at the last minute, so the AL crew decide to throw her a prom at the facility.

episodes.name: Jumping the Broom
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Leah plan a ceremony to renew their vows.

episodes.name: Unpleasant Days
episodes.overview: Anastasia helps prepare Phillip for a Shakespeare performance at school, Leah pushes Vinny to take his health seriously, and Pleasant Days is shaken by an unexpected loss.

episodes.name: Forgive and Forget
episodes.overview: Reginald seeks forgiveness from his estranged son.

episodes.name: Forgive and Forgive
episodes.overview: Sandra and Philip's relationship is tested over an immature mistake.

episodes.name: Judge Knot
episodes.overview: Lindor gets some unexpected help fighting his court case.

episodes.name: Pastor Disaster
episodes.overview: When Cora announces that the church board is seeking a new pastor, which comes with an impressive salary, Brown decides to throw his hat into the pulpit.

episodes.name: Mr. Fix It
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown gets Philip to fix his broken things, but soon starts to take advantage.

episodes.name: Testing 1,2,3
episodes.overview: The Pleasant Days crew has their work cut out for them when they help Philip prep for the S.A.T.

episodes.name: Efe the Great
episodes.overview: When Efe becomes an accidental hero the Assisted Living crew uses his fame for their own gain.

episodes.name: I Would Dye For You
episodes.overview: After Jeremy gets a gray hair, he sets out to prove he's not getting old. Mr. Brown has to speak at a funeral.

episodes.name: Ear Hustle and Flow
episodes.overview: When Vinny uses his new hearing aid to eavesdrop, Jeremy decides to teach him a lesson, and Phillip lets his first modeling gig go to his head.

episodes.name: Wobble Wobble
episodes.overview: Leah grows concerned for her daughter's future when Sandra announces she won't be going to college, and Vinny's sedentary lifestyle prompts the housemates to stage an intervention.

episodes.name: Clean Up Your Act
episodes.overview: Cora is fed up with the residents' messy ways and creates a strict new set of rules in hopes of getting the home in order, and Jeremy intends to bring in an undesirable boarder.

episodes.name: Don't Chi Away
episodes.overview: When Jeremy and the family announces to the crew that they're moving back to Chi-town, they do what they can to stop them from moving.

episodes.name: Ex to Next
episodes.overview: Anastasia rekindles a romance after her unfaithful ex-husband arrives from Paris, and Mr. Brown spearheads a prank war with a neighboring assisted living facility.

episodes.name: Training Day
episodes.overview: Anastasia gives reluctant Sandra etiquette lessons before the Ellington ball, and Jeremy preps Phillip for his lacrosse team tryouts.

episodes.name: Bye-Bye, Mr. Brown
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Leah are caught in a compromising position by the kids, and Mr. Brown is determined to check items off his bucket list when he thinks he has only a few months to live.

episodes.name: Don't Get Ugly
episodes.overview: When a mogul investor makes a big offer to buy the place for one point five million dollars, Brown buckles and seeks to sell his share causing division in the household.

episodes.name: Head In The Clouds
episodes.overview: Leah and Jeremy are excited to get away for a vacation with just the two of them; Sandra needs to get an internship to graduate; she has no prospects.

episodes.name: Twin it to Win It
episodes.overview: Anastasia's twin sister comes to visit, but not everyone is happy about it.

episodes.name: She Got Baby Fever
episodes.overview: After multiple failed attempts to try and hang out with Sandra for a girl's day, Leah reaches the sad realization that her baby is no longer a baby.

episodes.name: Fight The Power
episodes.overview: Phillip has been very responsible and begs to drive Jeremy's new car; Jeremy gives him the opportunity to drive, Philip wrecks Jeremy's new car after a night out with his friends.

episodes.name: Blessin Or A Lesson
episodes.overview: Phillip has been very responsible and begs to drive Jeremy's new car; Jeremy gives him the opportunity to drive and Philip wrecks Jeremy's new car after a night out with his friends.

episodes.name: Crazy in Love
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown has a new love interest from church and takes her on several dates; the Pleasant Days crew begins to grow suspicious of his new lady friend's intentions, and considers whether or not to butt into his love life.

episodes.name: I Believe
episodes.overview: Philip learns about being accountable for one's actions and putting life's obstacles in perspective; Reginald must pick himself up out of his slump and find the strength to believe in love again.

episodes.name: Houston, We Have a Karen
episodes.overview: When an old white woman moves into Pleasant Days, her Karen behavior throws everyone for a loop; Reginald fears an escaped convict he put in prison has plans to take revenge.

episodes.name: Yee To The Haw
episodes.overview: In a get-rich-quick scheme, Mr. Brown decides to become a Country & Western singer. Jeremy is hesitant to get his first prostate exam.

episodes.name: Friday Night
episodes.overview: When Leah ices Jeremy out during a fight about her spending habits, Efe and Anastasia dole out relationship advice, and Mr. Brown gets a new lease on life with a full head of hair.

episodes.name: Cupid Don't Lie
episodes.overview: When Phillip's teacher arrives to prepare him for an essay contest, Mr. Brown develops a crush on her, and Anastasia questions whether Efe's romantic feelings for her are sincere.

episodes.name: Dang, Leave Me Alone
episodes.overview: Jeremy is forced to stand up to his overbearing mother while Philip and Leah work hard to engineer the, "Damn, leave me alone prank" that's been going viral on the internet.

episodes.name: Making a Pitstop
episodes.overview: A Southern retired trucker plans to move into Pleasant Days, but his bigoted daughter tries to stop him from doing so.

episodes.name: Atrocious Hypnosis
episodes.overview: A friendly disagreement results in Anastasia hypnotizing Mr. Brown into thinking he's a kung fu master, and the residents of Pleasant Days are shocked by Efe's new, much younger girlfriend.

episodes.name: Rich Ditch
episodes.overview: The family's values are tested when Phillip begins dating a wealthy and generous young lady, and Efe, scrambling to pay his back taxes, is lured into a questionable new business.

episodes.name: Finally, Father's Day
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Mr. Brown feel underappreciated by Leah and Cora's lackluster efforts to celebrate Father's Day, and Jeremy struggles to accept that Leah makes more money than him.

episodes.name: Once Was Lost
episodes.overview: When Reginald is put in charge of Cora's precious family heirloom bible and gives it away to charity, he's got to figure out how to replace ot before Cora discovers it missing.

episodes.name: We Got Your Back
episodes.overview: Philip is spending a lot of 0me on the phone with his new girlfriend Chilecia so the family wants to meet her. She turns out to be a little too hood for the family.

episodes.name: Drop Out Like It's Hot
episodes.overview: Sandra is stressed out at college and decides to drop out, but Jeremy and Leah have concerns; Anastasia gets the itch to rekindle her celebrity career.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Act Son
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown and Efe team up to secretly film a reality show starring the oblivious Pleasant Days residents; Philip gets a part-time job at a fast food restaurant but begins to have second thoughts.

episodes.name: French Miss
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown attempts to impress a woman he thinks could be the future Mrs. Brown; when Mr.Brown's five-star dinner reservations fall through at the last minute, he solicits Philip to help whip up something gourmet.

episodes.name: Golden Oldie
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown's girlfriend causes a stir when Anastasia realizes they are competing in the same elderly pageant for the crown of Ms. Golden Oldie; Leah is appalled when Jeremy buys her a high-tech broom as an early birthday gift.

episodes.name: Big Thanks Little Thanks
episodes.overview: We don't have a summary for Big Thanks Little Thanks yet. Hang in there, or go ahead and contribute one.

episodes.name: Love Grows Here
episodes.overview: After Phillip goes out with his friends, Leah and Jeremy realize that he is a responsible young man. Through a counseling session, Leah and Cora teach the residents the importance of mental, physical and spiritual health.

episodes.name: Let the Church Say Amen
episodes.overview: When Cora runs for president of the local church, mud-slinging and sabotage threaten her reputation and test her faith. The Pleasant Days squad bolsters their ability to protect themselves by taking a self-defense class.

episodes.name: The White Flag
episodes.overview: Philip feels as though he is being treated like a child and resists his parents' punishment. Mr. Brown sends Kimberly an innocent text message that gets him into trouble.

episodes.name: Tough Love
episodes.overview: When Phillip makes a shocking decision, Jeremy rethinks the way he handled the recent argument between them. Everybody is worried about Phillip's safety, and Jeremy wonders if his tough love did more harm than good. Mr. Brown goes through a breakup.

episodes.name: Ay-Bay-Bay
episodes.overview: Leah wants to try for another baby; when Jeremy plays hard to get, Leah hatches a plan to seduce him; Mr. Brown has to babysit Kimberly's grandson who appears to be the perfect angel, until he reveals himself to be a mischievous handful.

episodes.name: One Drop
episodes.overview: When Efe's foundation offers free D.N.A. tests, Karen participates and discovers something; Leah employs Two Hunks and A Trunk to spur Jeremy into action to complete his "honey-do" list.

episodes.name: A Brown Baptism
episodes.overview: Vinny's nightmare makes him want to get saved; Mr. Brown does the baptizing, while Lindor is up to his neck in everyone's IT needs.

episodes.name: To The Left
episodes.overview: Jeremy and Leah hatch a plan to make Philip realize his worth and get out of his toxic relationship. Meanwhile, Anastasia lands a big audition that could help her get back on top.

episodes.name: Dying for Love
episodes.overview: Cora has been contacted by an old crush from high school who shows up, and to her surprise, he proposes; Leah gets concerned when Jeremy starts coming home later than usual and spending time with single friends she's never met.

episodes.name: Drippin' Jesus
episodes.overview: Sandra has been ghosting Lindor because she moved on to a new college boy so Lindor uses the family to try and win Sandra back; Mr. Brown writes his first gospel rap hit Drippin' Jesus and immediately releases it.

episodes.name: Forget Me Knot
episodes.overview: Reginald shocks the Pleasant Days crew when he begins behaving in uncharacteristic ways; Efe knows why but struggles to keep Reginald's secret; Karen challenges Vinny to a cook-off.

episodes.name: Roll Model
episodes.overview: Vinny's weed smoking is making him a bad role model for Philip, so he attempts to rehab his image by volunteering at Cora's church; Cora lands a date with a promising gentlemen.

episodes.name: Red Handed
episodes.overview: Philip gets caught watching porn by Leah, Jeremy brushes it under the rug causing a major rift between he and Leah because of Jeremy's betrayal. Efe encourages a role reversal exercise that brings all of Jeremy and Leah's,thoughts to light.

episodes.name: Cancel Culture
episodes.overview: Sandra wants to switch her college major, but she's afraid to tell her parents.
